column1: Online database for the Sustainable Development Report 2022
This database contains the following information:

column2: Overall results for all countries, including index score, goal dashboard, and trend dashboard for all indicators and goals
List of indicators, bounds and thresholds
The SDR2022 data for all countries; includes spillover score, raw values, normalized scores, dashboard ratings, trends & goal scores.
Raw data for all countries by indicator
Panel data used for generating trend analysis
The SDG Index Score, and all goal and indicator scores, retroactively calculated across time using time series data that was carried forward in years with missing data.

column3: This data should be cited as:  Sachs, J., Lafortune, G., Kroll, C., Fuller, G., Woelm, F., (2022). From Crisis to Sustainable Development: the SDGs as Roadmap to 2030 and Beyond. Sustainable Development Report 2022. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
